long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new era in enterprise learning. The first digital adoption platform with a non-disruptive learning experience.
The extension offers a streamlined and AI-driven solution to software training challenges. 
Benefiting from a suite of new features, it integrates an advanced digital assistant, the User Experience Panel (UXP), enhancing productivity across your entire software stack.

Key Features:

✅ AI-Powered In-App Guidance: Personalized step-by-step instructions and video tutorials for using any system.

✅ Automated Employee Onboarding: UXP recognizes user roles for targeted, real-time software guidance.

✅ Learning Integrated into Workflows: Access help and updates without leaving your work system, minimizing interruptions.

✅ AI-Powered Chat: Get authoritative assistance on any company or software-specific topics anytime.

✅ Centralized Updates: Get timely 'What's new'-guidance and personalized notifications.

✅ Raise Collective Knowledge: Maintain company wisdom within the software, improving overall effectiveness.

✅ Universal System Compatibility: Supports training across your entire software stack.

Touted as a one-stop solution, ClickLearn aims to simplify software learning and promote instant productivity from day one.
